title: Body part
description: Defines how damage is applied when hitting a specific body part

hitRate.description: The chances of hitting that body part. 0 being impossible and 1 being guaranteed. Body hit rate is added to weapon accuracy and  current pressure to determine if the attack is a hit or miss.

damageMultiplier.description: Multiplied to the weapon's damage before being applied to the receiver

damageReduction.description: Subtracted from the total damage received
